      Board​(GameManager gameManager)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addCustomKeyBindings​(int keyCode, java.lang.String id, javax.swing.AbstractAction action)
      registers a key with custom action (that will be executed whenever clicked)
      void addNotify()
      starts thread execution - starting the game and calls its parent's (JPanel) addNotify() function
      private void addPlayerKeyBindings​(int keyCode, java.lang.String id)
      registers a key (both pressing and releasing), action is just propagating the keycode to the Player class instance
      private void collisionEnemyShotPlayer()
      resolves collision between enemy's shot and the player if the player is hit then kill both the player and the shot, decrease points (-3)
      private void collisionPlayerShotEnemies()
      resolves collision between player's shot and enemies if an enemy is hit then kill both the enemy and the shot, increase points (+1)
      private void collisionShotsObstacles()
      resolves collision between both enemy/player shots and the obstacles if an obstacle is hit then kill the shot and corresponding obstacle Block instance
      private void initializeBoard()
      initializes all game objects and initial values
      void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      rendering all game objects (and their shots if they have any) - calling their draw() method rendering lives and scores indicators
      void refreshFrame()
      refreshes frame checks if there game has already ended and if so calls gameManager.renderAfterGame(int score) method with gained score if players state is set to "dying" then decrement lives variable and revive the player if game still continues then moves with every movable game object resolve collisions between game objects
      private void registerKeys()
      registers keys and their actions using Action API
      private void resolveCollisions()
      resolving collisions - player shot and enemies - enemy shots and player - both player/enemy shot and obstacles
      void run()
      basic game loop mechanism (refreshes after FRAME_REFRESH_TIME)

        public void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)

      • refreshFrame

        public void refreshFrame()
        refreshes frame checks if there game has already ended and if so calls gameManager.renderAfterGame(int score) method with gained score if players state is set to "dying" then decrement lives variable and revive the player if game still continues then moves with every movable game object resolve collisions between game objects

        private void resolveCollisions()
        resolving collisions - player shot and enemies - enemy shots and player - both player/enemy shot and obstacles

      • collisionShotsObstacles

        private void collisionShotsObstacles()
